meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Nancy Nakayama Nick Bulum Cathy Guiles Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6339.

td.p: Nancy Nakayama, a lawyer and aspiring grant writer from Seattle, Washington
Nick Bulum, a newspaper insert writer and designer from Long Beach, California
Cathy Guiles, a copy editor originally from Baltimore, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,600)

tr.td: HUNGER GAMES
MED. ABBREV.
A MATTER OF HOURS
HOW THE WEST WAS SPUN
HOBBIES
THE VERSATILE "O-U-G-H"
